sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-content>
      <v-container class="fill-height" fluid>
        <v-row align="center" justify="center">
          <v-col cols="12" sm="8" md="4">
            <v-card class="elevation-12">
              <v-card-text>
                <v-form>
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="input.login"
                    label="Login"
                    name="login"
                    type="text"
                  />
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="input.password"
                    id="password"
                    label="Hasło"
                    name="password"
                    type="password"
                  />
                </v-form>
              </v-card-text>
              <v-card-actions>
                <v-spacer />
                <v-btn text small @click="handlePressForgetPassword()">Nie pamiętam hasła</v-btn>
                <v-btn @click="handlePressLogin()" color="primary">Zaloguj się</v-btn>
                <v-btn text @click="handlePressRegister()" class="btn-register">Zarejestruj się</v-btn>
              </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-content>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "LoginPage",
  data() {
    return {
      input: {
        login: "",
        password: ""
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handlePressLogin() {
        /* eslint-disable no-console */
      console.log("Zostałeś pomyślnie zalogowany do systemu")
      /* eslint-enable no-console */
    },
    handlePressRegister() {
      window.location.href = "/register";
    }
  }
};
</script>
